mapper.insert: insert into mkt_cam_evt_rel (MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, CAMPAIGN_SEQ, EVENT_ID, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE,LEVEL_CONFIG, WHETHER_CONFIG, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE) values (#{mktCampEvtRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{campaignSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{levelConfig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{whetherConfig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update mkt_cam_evt_rel set MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CAMPAIGN_SEQ = #{campaignSeq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LEVEL_CONFIG = #{levelConfig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WHETHER_CONFIG = #{whetherConfig,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID = #{mktCampEvtRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, CAMPAIGN_SEQ, EVENT_ID,LEVEL_CONFIG, WHETHER_CONFIG, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_cam_evt_rel where MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID = #{mktCampEvtRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, CAMPAIGN_SEQ, EVENT_ID, LEVEL_CONFIG, WHETHER_CONFIG, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_cam_evt_rel

select MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, EVENT_ID,LEVEL_CONFIG, WHETHER_CONFIG, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_cam_evt_rel where EVENT_ID = #{contactEvtId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, EVENT_ID, LEVEL_CONFIG, WHETHER_CONFIG, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_cam_evt_rel where MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID from mkt_cam_evt_rel where EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by CAMPAIGN_SEQ asc
select MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, CAMPAIGN_SEQ, EVENT_ID,LEVEL_CONFIG, WHETHER_CONFIG from mkt_cam_evt_rel where EVENT_ID = #{eventId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by CAMPAIGN_SEQ asc

select MKT_CAMP_EVT_REL_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, CAMPAIGN_SEQ, EVENT_ID,LEVEL_CONFIG, WHETHER_CONFIG, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE from mkt_cam_evt_rel where MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{campaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and EVENT_ID = #{evtId}
